Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute near Madison/Ashland
ShortDescription: #20 Madison buses rerouted EB: via Damen, Warren, Ashland & Madison; WB via Ashland Washington, Damen & Madison: due to street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Madison/Ashland.

Eastbound buses will operate via Damen, Warren, Ashland, Madison, then resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Ashland Washington, Damen, Madison, then resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
